nycTheatreExcerpt: Sometimes, a song is so good you want to live in it. You want to nestle into its melodies, unravel the chords holding it up and more than anything, wander in the mind fields of the people who created it. David Adjmi's "Stereophonic" is the play that sparks this very desire.
